vclaim: Restrictions announced by Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau in March 2021 required that travelers entering the nation would be required to “immediately quarantine in designated government facilities” if they tested positive for COVID-19.
title: Will Canada Quarantine COVID-19-Positive Travelers in ‘Government Facilities’?
subtitle: The government called its border measures some of the “strongest in the world.”
author: Madison Dapcevich
